Patch Release : (x.x.1 - Fixes and Small Changes)

  Increments the patch version (e.g., 1.0.0 → 1.0.1).

  git commit -m "fix: resolve login issue in Casdoor integration"


Minor Release  : (x.1.x - New Features, Backward-Compatible Changes)

  Increments the minor version (e.g., 1.0.0 → 1.1.0)

  git commit -m "feat: add support for multi-factor authentication"


Major Release : (2.0.0 - Breaking Changes) 

  Increments the major version (e.g., 1.0.0 → 2.0.0).

Example 1 (Using BREAKING CHANGE in Footer) :

git commit -m "feat: upgrade Casdoor to v2 API

BREAKING CHANGE: The authentication API has changed and requires config updates."

Example 2 (Using ! in Commit Message) :

git commit -m "feat!: migrate Casdoor authentication to new API"
